metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15992 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient policy enforcement in networking in Google Chrome prior to86.0.4240.75 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to bypass same origin policy via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
